org.thesemproject.engine.segmentation.gui

Class FormulaTreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode
      • org.thesemproject.engine.segmentation.gui.ModelTreeNode
        • org.thesemproject.engine.segmentation.gui.FormulaTreeNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, MutableTreeNode, TreeNode

    public class FormulaTreeNode
extends ModelTreeNode
    Rappresenta il nodo di gestione di una formula
    Since:
    1.3
    See Also:
